text: The Lady and the Hooligan () is a 1918 Russian silent drama movie directed by Vladimir Mayakovsky and Yevgeni Slavinsky.Родной город Маяковского отмечает 125-летие со дня рождения поэтаБАРЫШНЯ И ХУЛИГАН (1918) It stars Vladimir Mayakovsky, Aleksandra Rebikova, and Fyodor Dunayev. == Actors == * Vladimir Mayakovsky — Lava, the hooligan * Aleksandra Rebikova — the schoolmistress * Fyodor Dunaev — the director of the school * Yan Nevinskiy — the hooligan's classmate == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1918 drama movies
title: The Lady and the Hooligan
